alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:05PM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT... Rain will mix with and change to freezing rain and light snow late Saturday night and Sunday. Up to an inch of snow and ice accumulations of a light glaze by late Sunday afternoon. Additional lake effect snow showers Sunday night. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
